sys_remote_update_set.description: v1.0 Adds 'Print' button to display contents of Update Sets v1.1 Adds ability to select multiple Update Sets in list view v1.2 Adds functionality to consolidate Updates from multiple Update Sets into their respective types v1.3 Fixed bug to print name of Flow / Subflows
sys_remote_update_set.name: Update Set Printer v1.3

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4a7070dd8708b91003d2c888cebb3563
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UpdateSetPrinterUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>UpdateSetPrinterUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetPrinterUtil = Class.create();
UpdateSetPrinterUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getUpdateLink: function(updateGR) {
        try {
            var update = gs.xmlToJSON(updateGR.payload);
            var link = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri');
			var name = updateGR.name.toString();
			var sys_id = name.substring(name.length - 32);
            if (update.record_update.table && sys_id) {
                link += update.record_update.table + "?sys_id=" + sys_id;
                return link;
            } else {
                return "";
            }

        } catch (e) {
            gs.error("Error building link for Update Set Printer:\n\n" + e);
            return "";
        }
    },

	getUpdateType: function(updateGR){
		var type = updateGR.type.getValue();
		return type == 'Flow' ? this._getFlowType(type, updateGR.payload)
			: type == 'Action Type' ? 'Flow Action'
			: type;
	},

	_getFlowType: function(type, payload){
		var update = gs.xmlToJSON(payload);
		var flowType = update.record_update.sys_hub_flow[0].type;

		return flowType == 'subflow' ? 'Subflow' : type;
	},

    type: 'UpdateSetPrinterUtil'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>mitch.deaner@rapdev.io</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-14 09:01:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>4a7070dd8708b91003d2c888cebb3563</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateSetPrinterUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4a7070dd8708b91003d2c888cebb3563</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mitch.deaner@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-14 11:23:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil = Class.create();
UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	checkDescription: function(){
		var sys_ids = this.getParameter('sysparm_sys_ids');
		var us = new GlideRecord('sys_update_set');
		us.addEncodedQuery('descriptionISEMPTY^sys_idIN' + sys_ids);
		us.query();
		if( us.next() ){
			gs.addErrorMessage("Please add Descripiton to '" + us.name.getValue() + "'.");
			return false;
		}
		return true;

	},

	enforceMandatoryDescription: function(){
		return gs.getProperty('rdusp.mandatory_description');
	},
	
	type: 'UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-29 16:38:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>UpdateSetPrinterClientUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_48f17b712f8021109cb0d6ab2799b6ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>mitch.deaner@rapdev.io</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-14 10:45:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
